fields.description: Auto-generated title based on the first few interactions of the conversation.
fields.label: Title

fields.description: Rolling summary of the conversation context, used when the history limit is exceeded.
fields.label: Summary

fields.description: The AI Agent configuration used for this conversation.
fields.label: Agent

fields.description: The specific AI model (e.g., GPT-4) used by the agent during this session.
fields.label: Model

fields.description: Timestamp of the most recent message or activity in this conversation.
fields.label: Last Activity

fields.description: Indicates if the conversation is currently active. Archived conversations may be read-only.
fields.label: Is Active

fields.description: Total count of messages exchanged in this conversation.
fields.label: Total Messages

fields.description: Cumulative number of input tokens sent to the LLM.
fields.label: Total Input Tokens

fields.description: Cumulative number of output tokens received from the LLM.
fields.label: Total Output Tokens

fields.description: Total token usage (Input + Output) for this conversation.
fields.label: Total Tokens

fields.description: Estimated total cost of the conversation based on model pricing.
fields.label: Total Cost

fields.description: Unique identifier for the session, often linked to a browser session or API client.
fields.label: Session ID

fields.description: Optional external reference ID (e.g., a WhatsApp phone number or external user ID).
fields.label: External ID

fields.description: Persistent memory store for the agent. Contains structured key-value pairs (user preferences, constraints, etc.) that survive summarization.
fields.label: Conversation Data
